name: iHausSmartLiving
0:
”Alexa, turn on BREAKFAST”
”Alexa, turn on GOOD BYE”
”Alexa, turn on GOOD NIGHT”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: i. house
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With iHaus Smart Living you can easily activate your individual scenes via voice control and check the status of various devices. For example, you can start your own “Good morning” scene when you wake up or leave the house with the “Everything off” scene. Connect all products from IKEA Trådfri, Philips Hue, Sonos and Apple HomeKit sockets and thermostats to your KNX system. This works via the iHaus Smart Living Platform, which you can control both via the App and voice control. In the following, you will find a step by step guide for an easy installation and set up.
Requirements:
- You need an account within the iHaus App. Make sure your version is up to date.
- IMPORTANT: The app must run in a 24/7 server mode on one of your smart devices. Find out how in the following tutorial: https://ihaus.com/app/24h-modus
- Voice control only works if you have already set up scenes and devices (like the iHaus smoke detector) on the iHaus Smart Living Platform.

Supported devices:
-------------------------- 
The following brands are currently compatible with the iHaus Smart Living Platform and can be activated with voice control. 
Brands, systems and devices: 
• Sonos 
• Philips Hue 
• KNX 
• Theben LUXORliving 
• JUNG 
• Apple Home Kit (all sockets, lights and thermostats) 
• Tesla 
• NETATMO 
• Nuki 
• Nest Protect 
• iRobot 
• Belkin WeMo 
• Tp Link HS 100 and HS 110 
• eKey 
• Mobotix 
• Gardena 
• Home Connect: Siemens, Bosch, Gaggenau, NEFF 
• IKEA Trådfri (lights, sockets, light panels, Symfonisk) 
• Homematic IP via CCU3 
• Discovergy Smart Meter 
• SMA Inverter 
• VARTA Battery storage

Services: 
• Stadtwerke München: M-Login 
• Weather: dtn 
• Traffic: Here 
• Voice control
• Defect management for property developers: edr Software 
• Insurance: ZURICH Smart Home Insurance
• Polarstern Ökostrom 

Do you have any questions or further inquiries regarding our iHaus Smart Living Platform? Please send an e-mail to support@ihaus.de
Have fun with iHaus!
